#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define gc() getchar_unlocked()

using namespace std;

inline void tez(int &x){
	register char c = gc();
	x = 0;
	for(;(c < 48 || c > 57); c = gc());
	for(;(c > 47 && c < 58); c = gc()){
		x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;
	}
}

int main(){
	register int N, l, count;
	register char str[100000];
	tez(N);
	while(N--){
		count = 0;
		scanf("%s", str);
		l = strlen(str);
		for(int i = 1; i < l; ++i){
			if(str[i-1] == str[i]){
				count ++;
			}
		}
		printf("%d\n", count);
	}
}
